page.title: 04East Hagbourne services
page.content: East Hagbourne is visited by a mobile library van once a month while the mobile fish and chip van calls every Friday. The Chiltern Queens bus service links the village to Reading, Didcot and Wallingford. There are a number of Clubs in the village: Junior Youth Club for 7-11year olds ; East Hagbourne Playgroup (held in Didcot) ; Hacca Club (Womens Social Club) is 12yrs in 1985. W.I. ; Bowls Club ; British Legion ; Hagbourne Society ; R.A.O.B. ; Football Club. At least 50% of the population are not regular attenders of any club, preferring to follow their own hobbies, the most popular being gardening (39%) and reading (14%) although there is great diversity from morris dancing to horncraft to astronomy.
